full_summary:
### **Project Title**

Field Support Services Project in Vietnam (FSSP) 2.0 Request for Proposal

### **Reference Number and Solicitation Number**

PW-23-01029542 (can be found in [Portal link](link))
2022-P-010649-7444735/B (can be found in [Portal link](link))

### **Overview of Contract**

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites proposals for the provision of field support services to improve the efficiency of program and project teams and the impact of Canada's international assistance in Vietnam. The services required encompass administrative, financial, and logistical support, procurement of goods and services, technical expertise, local development initiatives, and policy dialogue and knowledge sharing.

### **Objective and Expected Outcomes**

The objective of this project is to provide high-quality field support services that enhance the effectiveness and efficiency of Canada's international assistance programs in Vietnam. The expected outcomes include:

- Improved collaboration and communication among program and project stakeholders
- Enhanced capacity to deliver aid effectively and efficiently
- A stronger focus on local development initiatives

### **Duration and Estimated Contract Value**

The contract duration is from the contract award date to March 31, 2028. The estimated total value of the contract is approximately $X, which will cover the provision of the required services over the five-year period.

### **Trade Agreements and Requirements**

This tender is open to suppliers globally who are Canadian companies. The proposed project is eligible for funding under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### **Submission Requirements and Evaluation Criteria**

The RFP document includes detailed information about the submission requirements and evaluation criteria, and appendices for more information. 'Complete details can be found in the RFP document ([link](link))'.

### **Closing Date and Time**

The deadline for submitting proposals is May 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET.

For further information, kindly contact Isabelle Doray at Isabelle.Doray@international.gc.ca. You may also call (343) 551-0084. Should you have any questions about the submission process, we would be happy to help.
